title: Constructivist-Based Child Welfare Practice Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social welfare theories and comprehension of child development stages
context.additional_context: Online training for pre-service and in-service teachers to enhance child welfare case management competencies, aiming to cultivate problem-solving skills for real-world scenarios through a constructivist approach

learning_goals: Apply child welfare laws and policies to virtual case studies to design appropriate intervention plans
Analyze the psychological state of children who are victims of domestic violence and develop support strategies through VR simulations
Complete child welfare case evaluation projects with peer learners using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
